title: <source>
description: The `<source>` HTML element specifies multiple media resources for an `<audio>`, `<video>` or `<picture>` element. It allows the browser to choose the most appropriate media source based on factors like media type and codec support.
content: The element that is used within `<picture>`, `<audio>` or `<video>` elements to specify multiple media sources. It allows the browser to choose the best available source based on the user's device or preferences.
